summary: This is an email chain from April 1, 2021, in which attorney Mariann Wang informs recipients that her client has requested to cancel a scheduled meeting with prosecutors. The client, a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, is declining to be interviewed further due to emotional exhaustion from repeatedly recounting her experiences and a belief that her information would not materially advance ongoing prosecutions.

persons.name: Mariann Wang
persons.context: Attorney who sends the email to cancel a meeting between her client (an Epstein victim) and prosecutors, citing the client's exhaustion and assessment of the interview's utility.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Appears to be copied on the email regarding the cancellation of a meeting with prosecutors involving an Epstein victim client.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator with whom the attorney's client had interactions, which she has had to recount multiple times.

connections.description: Mariann Wang is acting as legal counsel for a client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, communicating on her behalf to cancel a meeting with prosecutors.
Gloria Allred is copied on the email concerning the client, suggesting she is also involved in the legal representation or case related to the Epstein victim.
The client is described as having had interactions with Jeffrey Epstein, which she has had to recount multiple times, identifying her as a victim.

events.title: Cancelled Meeting with Prosecutors
events.description: A scheduled meeting between an Epstein victim (represented by attorneys Mariann Wang and Gloria Allred) and prosecutors was cancelled at the client's request.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim, represented by attorneys Mariann Wang and Gloria Allred, declined a further interview with prosecutors in April 2021.
The victim cited emotional exhaustion from having to repeatedly recount her interactions with Jeffrey Epstein as the reason for cancelling.
The victim's assessment was that her information was unlikely to materially advance the ongoing prosecutions at that time.
The communication illustrates the ongoing legal proceedings and victim engagement efforts years after Epstein's death.
